alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Hardin; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 3:52AM EDT until June 14 at 4:30AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Delaware County in central Ohio... Eastern Hardin County in west central Ohio... Northeastern Union County in central Ohio... * Until 430 AM EDT. * At 351 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dunkirk, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Delaware, Kenton, Richwood, Ashley, Dunkirk, Radnor, Blanchard, Ostrander, Mount Victory, Magnetic Springs, Dola, Grant, Delaware State Park, Bellepoint, Pfeiffer, Hepburn, Warrensburg, Mentzer, Essex and State Route 257 at US Route 36. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
